title: You have to know that you like the job
creator_credit: Film Australia, Elisabeth Knight and David Haythornthwaite
brief_description: Apprentices in various areas such as bakery, mechanics, and stonemasonry talk about why they chose their particular area of work and how they feel about working in such an area.
